title: OP patch makes me loose fun of the game
body:
Hey Guys,

I am just playing lol very intensive for the last few days, but since the new patch i just feel like loosing fun.
Ban phase is not anymore useful for banning champ combinations, because i find myself only banning OP Tanks, Skarner, Mordekaiser, Garen and stuff like that.
ADC'S had it hard even before the patch, until RIOT decided to give the tanks even more power, stronger items etc.
Just played against a Mordekaiser who was 1/4 at Minute 7 because he got killed every time he went into lane.
That made him underlvlt ( 3 lvls below) and underfarmed as hell.
Just 15 Minutes later he flash Killed me FULL HP, stats still 2 / 5 and not much farm.

How can u give a champ so much power that he can still one shot fed other champs even if he is 2 lvls or 3 under them without noticable items ?

Even my enemy team playing against us laughed about their own OP champs.

Just wanted to ask if enough people here feel the same, idk what RIOT thought they were doing with this patch, the game is unplayable.
Not banning skarner or morde makes you see them 100 % on your game, guess why ?

Hope RIOT changes something here, otherwise i will take a look into heroes of the storm as my friends did as well.

What i wanted to add here, i never cried about tank meta only because i am ADC, i never complained. But this patch has gone too far.
